resources.string:
Hi,
My Name is Aihtsham Ali 
I'm a Software Developer with an experience in Web Development. Now I'm moving towards Android so this is my 3rd project in Kotlin Android. 
I'm following the Udacity course for this and to be honest it really worth it. 
Much spacing is given because the content is less and I need to test the scroll so ignore the extra line spaces please. 
I hope you will like my this android series and get some informative code from here. 
Have a nice day 
		 Good Bye :)
